phrases: Baby I trust you my friend
yume kanaeru made chousen wa tsuzuku
juunengo no mirai kagayaiteru sugata wa
koukai wa shinai jibun de egaita story
makenai to i am about to mune ni chikatta
yume no tochuu de meguriau deai to wakare
kimi ga oshietekureta boku dake ga motsu chikara
The fight does not end until I fulfill my dream
I wonder how far I have come now?
In ten years, I will be living the dream
It is the scenario I wrote for myself, so I will have no regrets
But life is not that easy, and it is full of obstacles
Still, I swear to myself that I will not ever back down
I have a dream that I absolutely want to achieve
So I fuel my passion until I succeed
There will be meetings and partings along the way
But I will simply believe in my strength that you have taught me
And rise back up again and again and again
zetsubou ni fushita kokoro no sumi
tooriame no ato ni mitsuketa niji wo motte
In this world, every day is dull and full of nonsense
I cover my ears, trying to mute the noise
Why do people hurt each other?
on the recesses of my heart, fallen into despair
While carrying this pain in my chest,
can I really dream of tomorrow?
can I really dream of tomorrow?
Remembering the rainbow I found after the rain,
Sacred Visual Girls School New ED song Symphony Right Before Dawn
The three popular characters form a group!!
Song) Sac-Vis Female Choir Club: Underclassmen Group
I am at the Jack New Year's party.
I want to take the top spot and grant your dream one day!
the fact that I was a member of Grade 6 Class 3 will never change.
the fact that I was a member of Grade 6 Class 3 will never change.
Akigusa Second Elementary School Graduation Anthology
I have been asked to make a photo book.
It seems they want to take some sketchy pics ()
I think it is your decision to make, not mine.
If I am going to do it, I want you to see me naked before then.()
Let us talk about this in person.
Because if you see me naked, I should not have a problem with anyone else seeing me in a bathing suit ()
Let us have a proper conversation about this photo book, and our dreams!
Akigusa Second Elementary School Graduation Anthology
Akigusa Second Elementary School Graduation Anthology
Akigusa Second Elementary School Graduation Anthology
Your dad is worried about you.
You are going to waste a chance like that?
Even for popular voice actresses, opportunities for photo books do not pop up too often.
But doing that kind of work before I become popular as a voice actress...
You want to be more popular, do not you?
Think of this as a stepping stone towards that.
If you really want to be a voice actress, you can do that after you get as popular as an idol!
I do not want to do another thing like the Sacred Visual Girls School ending...
Even with your lousy singing voice, you have got such good offers coming in!
Listen, if you refuse an offer like this, it will be very hard to make a living as a voice actress!
The world is not that easy!
Please let me think about it.
You have been in a huff for two weeks!
You have got to be on your best behavior.
Not as cute as you, so do not worry.
Are you saying that if she was, I would need to worry?
I do not know if the atmosphere will change just because I invited Miyoshi over.
But I have already tried turning on the radio and the TV.
Is there anything else I can do?
Um, this may be sudden, but this is my classmate and the person I am going out with...
And the one working in the middle is Takahama.
It is so nice to meet you!
Ogawa, sorry to interrupt, but she can do inking at least.
Feel free to give me work to do!
Well then, I can show you what needs to be done.
If you teach me, I can do anything you need!
Use me for other tasks, too!
It is like it just became more suffocating having another person in here.
Is not it too quiet in here for six people?
We have to, like, be more congenial!
Right, but I have no idea what to talk about.
Ogawa, do you have a girlfriend?
You are going to start out with a personal topic like that?!
I live with my girlfriend, and she is pregnant.
We are not getting married yet.
That is why you have several jobs.
I have to pull in a decent income, you see.
When will the baby be born?
It is still a ways off.
I will be counting on you tomorrow!
Sorry for calling you over so suddenly.
I was surprised at Ogawa though.
That is why he is assisting other authors, too.
Monday and Tuesday he assists the author of Shounen 3.
He is working hard since he is going to be a daddy.
You can go now too, Miyoshi.
There is nothing left to do.
The one you won at the New Year's party!
We have got a meeting with our editor now.
I was surprised when he suddenly brought his girlfriend over.
Having another girl around was a bit relaxing.
Now that we have got more people, I can give you more time to work on your own project.
I am happy just being an assistant.
Though I went to a technical school for manga,
ever since then, I have been told I have no talent for writing stories.
I can draw, but I cannot write.
That is why I polished my skills as an assistant.
But I think it turned out well.
I think you are great, Ogawa!
I can learn a lot from you.
Have you gotten used to your assistants?
Then let us talk about your fourth chapter.
Takagi, have you thought of a rival?
Well, I am thinking of a detective who tries to arrest the protagonist, like Zenigata from Lupin III...
But that is not very shounen-like.
Just having a rival makes everything more exciting!
Then why wait till the fourth chapter?
I am not going to touch the chapters that Hattori approved and submitted to the serialization committee.
If you are kicked out by your 3rd chapter, it is his fault.
But you are going to start revising your story in the fourth chapter based on reviews of the previous ones.
If the first does well, go with that plotline.
If it does not, then change it to option two for the next chapter.
Miura, what is your honest opinion of chapter three?
If we are not brutally honest with each other, we cannot call this a business meeting.
But I also think it is the best one so far.
Well, how should I put this?
Once you have a popular manga, you can play around with it a bit,
but at the beginning, everyone is desperate.
They do not have any room to relax.
I like a bit more fluff.
But since you are bringing the story to a conclusion in the first three chapters,
you had no space to play around with it.
So that is why chapter three is the best.
Well, there is not much to change.
Hattori's diligence shines through, and it is tightly done.
I am still an underling, so I think the way he did it is correct.
But the manga changes slightly according to the preferences of the editor.
You are not being very clear.
So you think it can be popular?
Since we are doing it, we have to think it will be a hit!
If the people making it do not think it is good, it definitely will not be!
And there will be people who enjoy our work!
Take pride in that, and it will encourage you to make the story even better!
He is not a bad guy.
I do not think so either, but...
I will make up two different storyboards for chapter four like he suggested.
You have until the end of the month to make a decision about the photo book.
Come to think of it, I have not talked to her lately.
Okay, I will call her tonight.
I have to make myself useful as an author's assistant!
Anyways, I am counting on you.
I will take care of it!
Sorry, did I make a mistake?
Well, it is about the effectiveness of this panel...
Oh, is it hard to understand?
It is hard to grasp the meaning of it.
How is it going, you two?
I am done with today's work.
Sorry, Kato, but can you split the rest with him?
At the rate he works, he can handle the rest of it no problem.
I will get tomorrow's work ready!
I will take what is left and finish it at home.
No, I will finish up today's work.
Then I will stay here a bit longer, too.
I want to work at Disney.
I think that if you aim to be a manga artist, you should dream big.
But why did you bring that up all of a sudden?
I respect you for your work ethic, working on a serialization while still in high school.
But those two who just left are no good.
They are satisfied just being assistants.
I just do not get it.
Ogawa's taken assisting to another level, and since he is skilled, I can understand.
But Kato's satisfied with herself just being an assistant.
There is no way we can understand each other.
That is why I want you to work hard, Sensei.
But you do not have to call me Sensei.
Then I will call you Mashiro.
What kind of manga do you like?
It is also important to communicate.
I am headed to our office now.
I want to finish before they get there.
After I am done with the classroom chores, I will head right over.
I forgot to ask about Azuki.
Even for me, it is too simple.
I actually do not want her to do it, but I do not want to tell her that flat out.
What are you talking about, Azuki?!
Wait a minute, would Azuki even joke about wanting me to see her naked?
Why does not she pick up?
And then Negishi suddenly started singing!
Can I talk to you for a minute?!
He would have to fight for her!
Did you tell Saiko Azuki's address?
What the hell is he doing?
She said if she does not do this, she might not get any work as a voice actress.
Azuki's been suffering alone all this time!
Why did not I realize it sooner?
She is been acting strange a lot, too!
You are abandoning the manuscript to go on a date?!
It is our first serialized chapter!
You said If my dream comes true a million times!
I will draw when I get back.
How long do you think it takes to get to Azuki's house?!
If you do not proceed with the manuscript.
our assistants will have nothing to do!
She will not answer her phone.
I am going because I do not know what happened and I cannot talk to her!
I have been trying, but she will not pick up.
But I think her mom will answer.
Hi, this is Takagi, a classmate of Azuki's from middle school.
Oh, it is been a while.
Actually, I have a favor to ask.
Miho, you have got a call from Takagi.
If you do not want to talk, answer the phone and tell them yourself.
I think you are listening, so I will talk.
Saiko is heading to your house.
He is ignoring the manuscript he has to draw.
If you are fine with that, then I misjudged you.
Go back and draw the manga!
I am sorry for causing trouble for everyone!
I thought I did not want to show you what I am like when I am depressed,
so I did not answer my phone.
But it is even worse for you to stop drawing manga because of me.
But Azuki, you are worried about the photo book, right?
Then it is better for me to go and talk to you in person...
Mashiro, just tell me one thing.
Regardless of how it will affect my career as a voice actress,
would you be happy if I made a photo book?
I would want to see your photo book, but I would not want other people to see it!
I would want it all for myself!
I think I should be doing something different with my career.
Last night, I looked at our elementary school yearbook.
I looked at where I wrote my dream for the future a voice actress.
I knew there was a job called voice actress, and I genuinely wanted to become one.
I want to preserve that feeling.
I am the same, I think.
When I was in elementary school, I admired manga authors, and I sketched a ton of manga in my school notebook.
But I gave up on it when I learned the harsh reality of it.
There was a person who tried too hard making manga, and died.
Knowing how that world works, I realize that if I step into it, my ideals and reality might change and even be crushed.
But the road is the same for everyone.
And I think there are people who will realize their dreams without being crushed, no matter what obstacle is in their way.
I will improve bit by bit.
Talking to you helped me sort out my feelings.
I feel better now, so do not worry and draw your manga.
And from now on, let us talk about everything.
I am sorry for being stubborn and acting tough, even while I was crying.
You are the one who said Let Us try hard and encourage each other.
If we do not talk, I cannot encourage you.
Mashiro, let us go to the beach one day.
We can take lots of pictures!
It is a promise for when our dreams come true.
Then that is a promise, too.
But just talking about dreams does not make them a reality.
You seem okay now, so I am going to hang up.
I am sorry for interrupting your chance at a date, Saiko.
Just come back and pen-in the manuscript.
Miho making a photo book, huh.
Yeah, in the end, she refused.
Can she continue her voice actress work?
Yeah, she got another call to audition.
And she asked me to properly apologize to Takagi.
You were really fearsome that day.
But it all went well after that.
Most importantly, TRAP safely began its first serialization.
Now we just have to wait and see how it does in the polls.
Yeah, a first chapter of a new series should get first place.
He will have the early results, will not he?
It is the start of TRAP's serialization.
I am worried about the ranking
I will fix up any problems with my team!
Fukuda, let me call you boss!
Even if my body is freezing, my dreams will not cool down!
